articles.title: Worthington puts together dream run to claim first gold in BMX freestyle - NBC Olympics
articles.description: It was an exciting first-ever women's BMX freestyle final with American Hannah Roberts sitting in first until Great Britain's Charlotte Worthington stole the show to claim gold.
articles.content:
RESULTS

articles.author: Deidre McPhillips and Christina Maxouris, CNN
articles.title: Less than 0.001% of fully vaccinated Americans died after a Covid-19 breakthrough case, CDC data shows - CNN
articles.description: Less than 0.004% of people fully vaccinated against Covid-19 experienced a breakthrough case resulting in hospitalization and less than 0.001% died from the disease, according to the latest data from the US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention.

articles.author: Christina Maxouris, CNN
articles.title: Some vaccinated Americans have lost their patience with those refusing the shot as Covid-19 cases surge and mandates return - CNN
articles.description: With Covid-19 cases and hospitalizations now surging again and officials across the US suddenly reimposing restrictions after a summer of semi normalcy, many vaccinated Americans are becoming increasingly angry at those who won't get vaccinated.

articles.description: With the clock ticking down to Sunday, the US was braced for a heartbreaking spectacle -- families with their belongings at the curbside wondering where to go. | World News
articles.content:
